caption:
🌱 Women are the backbone of many farming communities, making up nearly half of all smallholder farmers. Yet, they face unique challenges compared to their male counterparts, including limited access to land and resources. 
 
🌾 Meet Reina, one of many inspiring women farmers breaking barriers and cultivating change. As founding members of initiatives like @BetterLIfeFarming, we’re supporting women, like Reina, to gain access to products, tools, solutions, and knowledge. 

🤝 Building an alliance of global and local partners is the start. We’re empowering women to take the next step and play active roles in their communities. 

💚 We love to hear stories of women smallholder farmers around the world on their journey to becoming agri-entrepreneurs!
